FuncDef: The xml-translate abort command stops the CLI-to-XML translation. The xml-translate abort command stops the CLI-to-XML translation.
Examples: Warning: The running database will be locked when you enter the CLI-to-XML translate mode. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: In the translation mode, after the configuration commands to be translated are executed, to stop the CLI-to-XML translation, run the xml-translate abort command.
